comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; ru; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; ru; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13

Browser found new update for addon, then I close browser, later open a .html file from localhost. Opened window of installing update for addon, and show error, that the my .html file does not exist. Update installs, I again open my file and all was good.

Reproducible: Didn't try




about:buildconfig

Source

Built from http://hg.mozilla.org/releases/mozilla-1.9.2/rev/0c159bd1d600
Build platform
target
i686-pc-mingw32

Build tools
Compiler 	Version 	Compiler flags
cl 	14.00.50727.762 	-TC -nologo -W3 -Gy -Fdgenerated.pdb -DNDEBUG -DTRIMMED -Zi -UDEBUG -DNDEBUG -GL -wd4624 -wd4952 -O1
cl 	14.00.50727.762 	-GR- -TP -nologo -Zc:wchar_t- -W3 -Gy -Fdgenerated.pdb -DNDEBUG -DTRIMMED -Zi -UDEBUG -DNDEBUG -GL -wd4624 -wd4952 -O1

Configure arguments
--enable-application=browser --enable-update-channel=release --enable-update-packaging --enable-jemalloc --enable-official-branding --enable-tests
comments.author: kopylovdc@mail.ru

comments.raw_text: Are you trying to open the file while the add-on update window is open? That doesn't work because Firefox isn't loaded yet. You need to finish the add-on installation/update before trying to open a webpage - local or otherwise
comments.text: Are you trying to open the file while the add-on update window is open? That doesn't work because Firefox isn't loaded yet. You need to finish the add-on installation/update before trying to open a webpage - local or otherwise
comments.author: fmdevelopertim@gmail.com
comments.creator: fmdevelopertim@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
I try open the file before add-on update window open.
I start the browser opening the file, and there is add-on update window open.
comments.text:

I start the browser opening the file, and there is add-on update window open.
